document_data.name: Horn of Shasphur
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Horn of Shasphur''', also known as the '''Shield of Shasphur''', was a tavern located in the [[Market Floor (Djerad Thymar)|Market Floor]] of [[Djerad Thymar]]. It was owned by [[Clan Kepeshkmolik]], and it was one of the few taverns in Djerad Thymar where non-[[dragonborn]] were allowed to enter.

The tavern was named after [[Shasphur]], the founder of Clan Kepeshkmolik.
